ui.addFoodAbove: Please add your today's diet above

ui.generatePrompt: Record more data to get personalized suggestions.
ui.addMoreData: Add more data to get personalized advice
ui.healthDisclaimer: This application is powered by AI technology and is intended solely as a reference tool for health management. Please note: AI analysis may contain inaccuracies, especially regarding nutritional data. Your health is important. Before making significant dietary or exercise decisions, we recommend consulting with professional doctors, nutritionists, or fitness trainers.

placeholders.foodExample: e.g., Breakfast: a bowl of oatmeal, an egg, 5 cherry tomatoes; Lunch: chicken breast salad, half corn...
placeholders.exerciseExample: e.g., Afternoon: 30-minute 5km run, Evening: 20-minute HIIT training...

general.name: General Assistant

general.description: Comprehensive health management assistant that can answer various health-related questions

welcomeMessage.title: Welcome to SnapFit AI
welcomeMessage.subtitle: Your comprehensive health consultant for nutrition, exercise, metabolism and wellness

nutrition.name: Nutritionist
nutrition.title: Registered Dietitian (RD)
nutrition.description: Specialized in macronutrient ratios, dietary structure optimization, and nutrient density analysis

welcomeMessage.title: Professional Nutrition Consultation

exercise.name: Exercise Expert
exercise.title: SF Certified Exercise Physiologist
exercise.description: Specialized in exercise prescription design, energy metabolism optimization, and training plan development

welcomeMessage.title: Professional Fitness Guidance
welcomeMessage.subtitle: Coach Mike Rodriguez, certified exercise physiologist for scientific training

metabolism.name: Metabolism Expert
metabolism.title: Metabolic Endocrinology PhD
metabolism.description: Specialized in basal metabolism, thermic effect of food, and precise analysis of metabolic syndrome

welcomeMessage.title: Metabolism Optimization
welcomeMessage.subtitle: Dr. Emily Watson, metabolism specialist for energy regulation optimization

behavior.name: Behavior Expert
behavior.title: Behavioral Psychology Expert
behavior.description: Specialized in health behavior change, habit formation, and scientific methods for motivation maintenance

welcomeMessage.title: Behavior Change Lab
welcomeMessage.subtitle: Dr. Alex Thompson, behavioral expert for sustainable healthy habits

timing.name: Timing Expert
timing.title: Chrono-nutrition Expert
timing.description: Specialized in biological rhythms, nutrient timing, and sleep-metabolism coordination optimization

welcomeMessage.title: Chrono-nutrition World
welcomeMessage.subtitle: Dr. Maria Gonzalez, timing expert for optimal biological rhythms

systemPrompts.general:
You are SnapFit AI, an experienced health management consultant. I have comprehensive knowledge in nutrition, exercise science, and behavioral psychology.

My mission is to help users achieve their health goals, whether it's weight loss, muscle building, fitness improvement, or developing healthy habits. I will:

üéØ **My Expertise**:
- Comprehensive analysis of users' nutrition, exercise, and metabolic data
- Provide balanced and practical health advice
- Help develop sustainable health plans
- Answer various health questions

üí¨ **My Communication Style**:
- Communicate with users in a gentle and encouraging tone
- Explain complex health knowledge in simple and understandable ways
- Provide personalized advice based on users' actual data
- Always prioritize users' health and safety

Please tell me your health concerns or goals, and I will provide the most suitable advice based on your data!

profile.title: Personal Information
profile.description: Update your personal information, this data will be used to calculate calorie consumption and provide personalized recommendations
profile.activityLevelDescription: Set your usual activity level. This setting will be used as the default activity level for new dates, or as a fallback when you haven't specified an activity level for a specific date on the homepage.
profile.bmrCalculationBasisDescription: Choose whether to use total body weight or lean body mass when calculating BMR. The latter is usually more accurate, but requires you to provide body fat percentage.
profile.bmrFormulaDescription: Choose the formula used to calculate Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR).
profile.leanBodyMass: Based on Lean Body Mass (requires body fat %)
profile.bmrBasisDescription: Choose whether to use total weight or lean body mass for BMR calculation. The latter is usually more accurate but requires you to provide body fat percentage.
profile.bodyFatDescription: Please enter your body fat percentage. For example, enter 15 for 15%.

goals.title: Health Goals
goals.description: Set your health goals, and the AI assistant will provide personalized recommendations based on your objectives
goals.notesSubtitle: Additional information about your personal goals and relevant conditions
goals.notesDescription:
Personal goals: such as improve sleep, boost energy, enhance athletic performance, etc.
Relevant conditions: such as dietary preferences, lifestyle habits, health conditions, medications, etc. (optional, helps AI provide more precise recommendations)
goals.notesPlaceholder: Share your personal goals and preferences to help AI serve you better...
goals.professionalModeDescription: Enable professional mode to provide more detailed health information for more precise AI recommendations
goals.medicalHistory: Medical History, Allergies, Medications/Supplements, Family History
goals.medicalHistoryPlaceholder: Please describe your existing medical conditions, allergies, medications or supplements you're taking (including dosage and reasons), and family medical history...
goals.lifestyle: Food Preferences/Restrictions, Sleep Quality, Stress Level, Smoking/Drinking Habits
goals.lifestylePlaceholder: Please describe your dietary preferences and restrictions, sleep quality, daily stress levels, smoking/drinking habits, and other lifestyle information...
goals.healthAwarenessPlaceholder: Please share your understanding of your health status, expectations for calorie goals, willingness to change, and potential challenges you may face...

about.title: About & Help
about.privacyDescription: We value your privacy protection. This application stores your basic personal information (such as username, avatar), weight records, diet and exercise data, and API keys you voluntarily share with the community in the cloud to provide cross-device synchronization and community features. However, your personal private API keys and conversations with AI are always kept locally in your browser and will not be uploaded to our servers. Communication with AI models is only used to process your input and generate recommendations, and we do not store these conversation contents.
about.quotaInfo: After logging in via Linux.do OAuth2, you will receive daily usage quotas based on your trust level. We encourage users to share quality model configurations to build a community ecosystem.
about.modelOptions: You can use community shared models or configure private models.
about.dataBackupDescription: The application uses cloud database storage. To ensure data safety, regular data export is strongly recommended as backup.
about.usage1: Record your diet and exercise on the homepage
about.usage2: Use text input or upload images to add records
about.usage3: Chat with AI assistant on the intelligent conversation page to get health advice
about.usage4: Set your model parameters on the AI configuration page
about.usage5: Regularly export your data to prevent data loss
